nav.div: Franklin Parish School Board » Emergency Announcements » Office Hours Update

div.p: Due to the governor’s proclamation, Franklin Parish School Board office will be closed until further notice. You may call the office on Tuesday or Thursday between the hours of 9 a.m.- 12 p.m. at 318-435-9046.
